thought.text: Great! Let me test the reproduction case with the micromamba python:

action.command:
cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
from astropy.io import fits
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
hdu.writeto('diffbug.fits', overwrite=True)

print('FITSDiff identical:', fits.FITSDiff('diffbug.fits', 'diffbug.fits').identical)
fits.printdiff('diffbug.fits', 'diffbug.fits')
"

function.arguments:
{"command": "cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
from astropy.io import fits
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
hdu.writeto('diffbug.fits', overwrite=True)

print('FITSDiff identical:', fits.FITSDiff('diffbug.fits', 'diffbug.fits').identical)
fits.printdiff('diffbug.fits', 'diffbug.fits')
"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
